info.description: This is a service for running Techno-Economic Assessment (TEA) API, funded by California Energy Commission.
info.title: Techno-Economic Assessment

tags.name: TEA
tags.description: Find out the orginal excel spreadsheets in [California Biomass Collaborative](https://biomass.ucdavis.edu/tools/energy-cost-calculator/)

post.description: This route is used for generic-power-only (GPO) model
This route is used for generic-combine-heat-power (CHP) model
This route is used for gasification-power (GP) model
This route is used for hydrogen model

CapitalCost.description: Total installed cost of plant in $

NetElectricalCapacity.description: Size of plant in kWe based on net power output to grid

CapacityFactor.description: Annual fraction in % that rated capacity is available from plant

NetStationEfficiency.description: Ratio of net energy output from plant to fuel energy input to plant in %

FuelHeatingValue.description: Higher heating value (heat of combustion) in kJ/kg of fuel expressed on a dry basis input in SI units

FuelAshConcentration.description: Fraction of ash in fuel, percent dry basis

FuelCost.description: Cost of fuel in $/dry metric ton

LaborCost.description: Cost of labor to operate facility in $/year

MaintenanceCost.description: Cost of maintaining the plant in $/year

InsurancePropertyTax.description: Cost of insurance for the plant plus any property or other local taxes, in $/year

Utilities.description: Purchased utilities including power, gas, water, waste disposal, in $/year

AshDisposal.description: Cost of ash disposal from plant in $/year, use negative value when ash is sold at value

Management.description: Cost for administrative personnel and other administration, in $/year

OtherOperatingExpenses.description: All other expenses for operating the plant, for example natural gas not included in utilities, chemicals, or additives, in $/year

DebtRatio.description: Fraction of financing covered by debt borrowing in %

InterestRateOnDebt.description: Interest rate applied to debt portion of investment in %

CostOfEquity.description: Rate of return on equity portion of investment, in %/year

CapacityPayment.description: Payment in $/kW-year made from power purchaser if plant can guarantee capacity (depends on contract)

InterestRateonDebtReserve.description: Interest income earned on reserve account if financing institution requires security deposit, in %/year

GeneralInflation.description: Overall inflation rate in % used to adjust current dollar result to constant dollars

EscalationFuel.description: Rate in % at which fuel cost escalates over time

EscalationProductionTaxCredit.description: Specified index in % for production tax credit

EscalationOther.description: Rate in % at which other expenses escalate over time
